entry.title: In the Beginning
entry.content: I’ve always wanted to write more. This seems like a good way to start. Hopefully I’ll be able to write often and document my work while at the same time play around with Octopress, a static site generator that I’m using but I’ll talk about the tech behind this site in another post later. I’m probably going to try out Obtvse when I can and see how that’ll help with my writing. If you haven’t already noticed, I like Google’s Material Design Guidelines and that’s what guiding the site’s design. The site isn’t done yet, there’s still some rough edges and I’m still coding in some features that’ll mostly just help me automate stuff. Automation is really important to me, I’m efficient that way (some people say I’m just being lazy). So I guess that’s it for the opening post. Mind the Lorem Ipsum.
